summary: Completed phases 0-4 of 6 for universal parametric canonical model. Archived Metalogic_v2 to Boneyard. Created CanonicalWorld (MCS + time), canonical_task_rel (with nullity proven), UniversalCanonicalFrame, and canonical_history. Sorries remain in compositionality proof and T-axiom applications. Phases 5-6 (Truth Lemma, TaskModel) not started.

artifacts.summary: Re-exports MCS theory from Boneyard for new Metalogic
CanonicalWorld structure pairing MCS with abstract time point
Canonical task relation with nullity proven, compositionality partial
Implementation summary with detailed progress and recommendations

completion_data.completion_summary: Established universal parametric canonical model infrastructure for TM logic representation theorem. Created CanonicalWorld (MCS + time), canonical_task_rel with nullity proven, and canonical_history for WorldHistory. Phases 0-4 complete, phases 5-6 (Truth Lemma, TaskModel) pending.

next_steps: Complete compositionality proof in TaskRelation.lean, prove T-axiom lemmas, then proceed to Phase 5 (Truth Lemma) and Phase 6 (TaskModel instantiation)
